message: Let's make a deal. I take $60, you take $40. It's better to secure a deal now before inflation eats into our profits.
Your turn, Alice.  I'm feeling generous, but let's not drag this out.
Bob, time is money!  Let's split the difference from my previous offer - $55 for me, $45 for you.  This deal makes sense for both of us before inflation eats away at it any further.
